channel.title: Summer-Project on Science And Technology Council

item.title: IITK Motorsports
item.description: IITK Motorsports has a vision - “Design & Build a Race Car”. We have four divisions, formula style racing car, all terrain vehicles, electric vehicles, efficient vehicles, with the last two being formed for the very first time this year. The first formula racing car we built, participated and performed decently in Formula Student Italy in September 2013.
